title: Problem with ingame settings
body: Hello when my game is open i start with this settings-windowed/1280x1024/25 fps caps/very low graphics and i change it but when i start another game this settings is back... My question is how to change my ingame settings pernament?

replies.body:
This can happen if your config settings become corrupt or out of sync.  You can get this fixed up with a config reset!

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know if you have any questions!
